mapper.select: SELECT a.alarm_id AS alarmId, a.alarm_code AS alarmCode, a.alarm_reason AS alarmReason, a.alarm_level AS alarmLevel, a.start_time AS startTime, a.status AS alarmStatus, e.equipment_id AS equipmentId, e.equipment_code AS equipmentCode, e.equipment_name AS equipmentName, e.equipment_model AS equipmentModel, e.location AS location, e.status AS equipmentStatus, e.manufacturer AS manufacturer, e.production_date AS productionDate, e.installation_date AS installationDate, e.last_maintenance_date AS lastMaintenanceDate, e.maintenance_cycle AS maintenanceCycle, e.create_time AS createTime, e.update_time AS updateTime, t.type_name AS typeName, t.description AS description, t.parameters_config AS parametersConfig FROM equipment_alarm a INNER JOIN equipment e ON e.equipment_id = a.equipment_id INNER JOIN equipment_type t ON e.equipment_type = t.type_id WHERE a.status = 0 ORDER BY a.start_time DESC
